resources.string: Welcome to the FET app.Please note the folowing
* This app is solely for FET UB
* It contains all info and updates partaining to this Faculty
* It contains the course outline for the various departments in FET
* Please click on GO below to continue

The faculty of engineering and technology is a newly found faculty in the University of Buea.It was created 2009 with a well structured degree program which runs for 4 years.It was created with the intention of admitting students through a competitve entrance exam from the best are selected but sinve it is still juvenile, admission into this prestigous faculty in done by Study of document where your past A and O level results are studied thouroughly.This Faculty provides Two departments with each having two specialties.

We have the department of Computer Engineering and Electrical Engineering.In the Department of Computer Engineering We have Software and Networks Enginerring While in Electrical Engineering we have Telecommunications and Power Engineering.It should be noted that specialisation in this faculty undar either of the departments is only possible in your third year as a student
Your third year as a student.
